overwolf.inDevelopment: This app is in development! Right now, only Hogwarts map is available and some nodes are missing.
overwolf.activateOverlayDescription: This window is only visible as overlay in-game. Deactivate it, if you like to move this window to second screen or to ALT+TAB it.
overwolf.realtimeStatusToopltip: This tells you if the connection to Hogwarts Legacy is estaiblished and the player position could be synced with the map.
overwolf.latestSavegameDescription: The latest savegame is required to sync your progress and discovered nodes on the map (in development).
